fields.headline: Commonwealth absentees
fields.bodyText: Men 100m Ato Boldon (Trinidad), bad form; Francis Obikwelu (Nigeria), now represents Portugal 400m Mark Richardson (England), injured; Greg Haughton (Jamaica), dispute with federation 800m Japheth Kimutai (Kenya), no visa 1500m Noah Ngeny (Kenya), not selected; Bernard Lagat (Kenya), not interested Marathon Paul Tergat (Kenya), not interested 3,000m steeplechase Reuben Kosgei (Kenya), not interested Triple jump Larry Achike (England), not selected Pole vault Riaan Botha (South Africa), injured Hammer Chris Hames (South Africa), religious grounds Women 100m Merlene Ottey (Jamaica), now represents Slovenia 400m Cathy Freeman (Australia), husband ill; Katharine Merry (England), injured; Donna Fraser (England), injured 10,000m Elana Meyer (South Africa), not selected Marathon Catherine Ndereba (Kenya), not interested Heptathlon Denise Lewis (England), had a baby
